recipe.title: Chile Peanuts
instructions: Preheat oven to 250°F with rack in middle. Whisk together lime juice, oil, paprika, sea salt, and cayenne. Stir in peanuts to coat evenly. Spread peanuts in a large shallow baking pan and bake until coating is dry and fragrant, about 30 minutes. Cool completely before serving.
